title: How to Make Wassail (a Warm Punch)

steps.headline: Warm apple cider in a stock pot.
Wrap whole allspice and whole cloves in cheesecloth or a tea ball.
Add this spice packet to pot along with the cinnamon sticks.
Remove spice sack and cinnamon sticks.
Add 1/4 cup brown sugar, if desired, for more sweetness.
Serve warm, garnished with orange slices.

text: Warm apple cider in a stock pot.  Add frozen orange juice concentrate.  Wrap whole allspice and whole cloves in cheesecloth or a tea ball.  Add this spice packet to pot along with the cinnamon sticks.  Simmer for one hour.  Remove spice sack and cinnamon sticks.  Add 1/4 cup brown sugar, if desired, for more sweetness.  Serve warm, garnished with orange slices.  Finished.
